mapper.update: create table hdg_shop_income_ratio_history_${suffix} ( agent_id int unsigned not null, /*运营商id*/ shop_id char(12) not null, /*门店id*/ stats_date char(10) not null, /*统计日期*/ agent_name varchar(40), /*运营商名称*/ ratio tinyint not null, /*分成比例*/ platform_deduct_money int, /*计入平台分成 每单从运营商收入里面扣除多少钱*/ shop_fixed_money int, org_type tinyint not null, /*1 平台 2 运营商 3 省代 4 市代 5 门店*/ org_id bigint unsigned,/*对应的运营商id*/ org_name varchar(40), create_time datetime not null, primary key (agent_id, stats_date, shop_id, org_type) ) engine=innodb default charset=utf8;
mapper.insert: insert into hdg_shop_income_ratio_history_${suffix} (agent_id, shop_id, stats_date, agent_name, ratio, platform_deduct_money, shop_fixed_money, org_type, org_id, org_name, create_time) values ( #{agentId}, #{shopId}, #{statsDate}, #{agentName}, #{ratio}, #{platformDeductMoney}, #{shopFixedMoney}, #{orgType}, #{orgId}, #{orgName}, #{createTime})
